## intType variable

Returns the smallest possible \*signed\* int type enum for given `x`<!-- -->. E.g. if `x >= -128 && x < 128`<!-- -->, the function returns `Type.I8`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
intType: (x: number) => IntType
```
